languages.text: "Ткачи больше не несут смерть погрязшим во грехе. Неужели... Император отвернулся от нас?"

traits.locale_text: "Ткачи больше не несут смерть погрязшим во грехе. Неужели... Император отвернулся от нас?"

languages.text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
languages.original_text: "Ткачи больше не несут смерть погрязшим во грехе. Неужели... Император отвернулся от нас?"

traits.locale_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
"No more are the weavers granting mercy to those who yearn for it. Could it be... the Undying One has turned His back on us?"
"The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
"The weavers no longer grant mercy to those who yearn for death's embrace. Has the Undying One turned his back on us?"
"The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
"The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
"The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
"The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
"The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"

languages.text: « Les tisseurs ont cessé d'éliminer les scélérats de tout poil. L'Empereur nous aurait-il abandonnés ? »
languages.original_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"

traits.locale_text: « Les tisseurs ont cessé d'éliminer les scélérats de tout poil. L'Empereur nous aurait-il abandonnés ? »
« Les tisseurs ne délivrent plus ceux qui aspirent à la douce étreinte de la mort. L'Immortel nous aurait-il abandonnés ? »

languages.text: «Los tejedores ya no conceden la paz a quienes se hayan internado en la villanía. ¿Nos ha dado la espalda el Emperador?».
languages.original_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"

traits.locale_text: «Los tejedores ya no conceden la paz a quienes se hayan internado en la villanía. ¿Nos ha dado la espalda el Emperador?».
«Los tejedores ya no conceden la paz a quienes buscan el descanso de la muerte. ¿Nos ha abandonado el Inmortal?».

languages.text: “那些织网者已经不再管满手罪孽的恶人了，是不是帝皇已经遗弃了我们？”
languages.original_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"

traits.locale_text: “那些织网者已经不再管满手罪孽的恶人了，是不是帝皇已经遗弃了我们？”
“织网者已经不再帮助那些渴望死亡的人获得解脱了，莫非不死之神已经遗弃我们了吗？”

languages.text: 「織り手たちはもはや、悪に染まった者たちに死を与えることはない。皇帝は我々に背を向けたのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"

traits.locale_text: 「織り手たちはもはや、悪に染まった者たちに死を与えることはない。皇帝は我々に背を向けたのでしょうか？」
「織物職人はもはや、死の抱擁を切望する者たちに慈悲を与えない。不滅の神は我々に背を向けたのか？」

languages.text: "Die Spinner bringen Schurken nicht mehr den Tod. Hat sich der Imperator von uns abgewandt?"
languages.original_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Spinner bringen Schurken nicht mehr den Tod. Hat sich der Imperator von uns abgewandt?"
"Die Weber gewähren jenen, die sich nach der Umarmung des Todes schließen, keine Gnade mehr. Hat sich der Todlose von uns abgewendet?"

languages.text: "Dokurlar, artık yüreği habislikle dolanlara ölüm bahşetmiyor. Yoksa İmparator bize sırtını mı döndü?"
languages.original_text: "The spinners no longer grant death to those steeped in villainy. Has the Emperor turned His back on us?"
